entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
